overview: Hanif, a 'rental car' driver around Johor. One night, Usin asked for Hanif's help to get him to Batu Pahat. While passing through the intersection, Hanif came across a girl named Suri standing on the sidewalk. Hanif stopped his car and offered a ride. Since meeting Suri, Hanif began to 'go crazy' and neglected his wife. Things got worse when Hanif was suddenly reported missing!
title: Simpang Sejenak
